Html:
I was in a hurry with my application, and thought it was a problem of GMAP.

I was searching the error and contact Radioman through e-mail an then through skype.

He tell me how to try my code, and we discovered the trouble wasn't GMAP.

I needed to make rotations 4 times a second... an the control could do it at least 10 times a second!!!!!!!

 

Very powerfull work, and very exceptionall kind of person behind the code.

 

Thank you very much my frien... from Argentina (in south america, for the ones doesnt know... jejeje)

 

Greetins

 

Yeyo
